de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.methods.methods

Interface DictMethodAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DictMethods

    public interface DictMethodAPI
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA. User: Timo Homburg Date: 12.11.13 Time: 12:37 Interface for implementing dictionary based applications.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • charSegmentParse

        void charSegmentParse(java.lang.String filepath,
                    DictHandling dicthandler)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Tries to match every character as a word. While in Chinese this is quite effective it is not guaranteed for other languages.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path of the file to analyse
        dicthandler - the dicthandler to use
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • initParsing

        void initParsing(java.lang.String sourcepath,
               java.lang.String destpath,
               DictHandling dicthandler,
               MethodEnum method)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Initialization method for the parsing methods.
        Parameters:
        sourcepath - the path of the file to analyse
        destpath - the result path
        dicthandler - the dicthandler to use
        method - the method to use
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error

      • maxEntropyMatching

        void maxEntropyMatching(java.lang.String filepath,
                      DictHandling dicthandler)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Performs maxEntropyMatching for segmentation.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the file to perform maxEntropyMatching on
        dicthandler - the dicthandler to use
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error

      • maxMatch

        void maxMatch(java.lang.String filepath,
            DictHandling dicthandler,
            boolean left)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Dictionarybased approach. Matches the longest word possible.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path of the file to analyse
        dicthandler - the dicthandler to use
        left - indicactes if it should be matched from left to right or right to left
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error

      • minMatch

        void minMatch(java.lang.String filepath,
            DictHandling dicthandler)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Dictionarybased approach. Matches the shortest word possible.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path of the file to analyse
        dicthandler - the dicthandler to use
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error

      • randomSegmentParse

        void randomSegmentParse(java.lang.String filepath,
                      DictHandling dicthandler)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Calculates word boundaries for every line at random.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path of the file to analyse
        dicthandler - the dicthandler to use
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • tangoAlgorithm

        void tangoAlgorithm(java.lang.String filepath,
                  DictHandling dicthandler,
                  int ngramsize)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Calculates word boundaries using the tangoAlgorithm.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path of the file to analyse
        dicthandler - the dicthandler to use
        ngramsize - the size of the ngrams to use
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
